sentences.english: Because he got rid of his ignorant and uncouth sweetness, he is no longer a boy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲褪去了年少無知和天真爛漫，他就不再是孩子了。

sentences.english: I believe all the sweat and tears, finally become a full bloom.
sentences.chinese: 相信所有的汗水與眼淚，最後會化成一篇山花爛漫。

sentences.english: It is no doubt a pleasure to explore the wonders of nature with children who are so innocent and lovely.
sentences.chinese: 與天真爛漫的兒童一起接觸大自然確是賞心樂事。

sentences.english: I love him all the better for his innocence.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲他的天真爛漫，我才更加愛他。

sentences.english: Blossoming flowers are overspreading our embracing footprints.
sentences.chinese: 山花爛漫鋪滿着我們相守相擁的足跡。

sentences.english: IT media had a kind of pediment really brilliant lively.
sentences.chinese: IT媒體的確有了一種山花爛漫的熱鬧。

sentences.english: To live like the booming spring flowers, to die as the graceful fall leaves.
sentences.chinese: 生如春花之爛漫，死如秋葉之靜美一樣的性格。

sentences.english: All the shrubs are in blossom .
Brilliant fireworks (or catharine) of many years.
Its a mixture of narcissism and naivety.
sentences.chinese: 這真是有些自我陶醉天真爛漫。

sentences.english: The design of children room, want to consider the character with childlike children above all.
sentences.chinese: 兒童房的設計，首先要考慮兒童天真爛漫的特性。

sentences.english: There they innocently sing their repertory of dirty songs.
sentences.chinese: 他們天真爛漫地唱着成套的下流歌曲。

sentences.english: Drunken Beauty downtown Red, send a ray of sweet gospel, flowers are blooming to be king return.
sentences.chinese: 貴妃醉酒鬧紅塵，一縷芬芳送福音，山花爛漫待君歸。

sentences.english: These characters are perceived as symbols of youthful naivety in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 這種萌萌噠形象在日本被視爲“天真爛漫”的象徵。

sentences.english: Qing River, pedestrian in a continuous line, the bloom of fireworks, bright star.
sentences.chinese: 清溪河畔，行人絡繹不絕，兩岸煙花爛漫，璀璨星河。

sentences.english: Our goal as adults should be to become more childlike.
sentences.chinese: 作爲成年人，我們應該更加天真爛漫。

definition: to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
Mancheng county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
